p: For now, the treatments we have for people who get covid-19 and need hospital care are supportive therapies: fluids, painkillers and fever reducers, and antibiotics to treat opportunistic bacterial infections. Those with seriously impaired lung function will rely on ventilators to breathe for them. All of these measures buy time to keep a person alive until their immune system can fight off the virus. But if a cytokine storm becomes part of the problem, doctors have few good options.
